mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTIFICATION WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND READ_YN = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_NOTIFICATION SET READ_YN = '1' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND READ_YN = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, MESSAGE, TEMPLATE_NM, TEMPLATE_NO, NOTIFICATION_TIME, SENT_AT, SENT, READ_YN FROM TBL_NOTIFICATION WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY SENT_AT DESC LIMIT #{limit}
